dialogue.text: ... ... ... No. Y'know what?! I am not going to be outplayed by some blue haired RUNT!
You want a fight?! An absolute shitshow?\nFINE BY ME.
You're about to find out what happens when\nyou piss me off.
Too late for apologies. It's time to go to WAR?, and THERE AIN'T A SINGLE FUCK TO GIVE LEFT.
